content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Mr. Abbasi, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. Let's start with a high price, shall we? I'm asking for 1500 Euros per month. Remember, this is a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center of Magdeburg, close to all important facilities.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand that you're offering a nice apartment in a great location, but the price is a bit high for me. I'm a student and I'm looking for something more affordable. Is there any room for negotiation on the price?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Of course, we can negotiate. But remember, the location and quality of the apartment are top-notch. How about we drop the price to 1400 Euros per month? I'm sure you'll find it's a fair price for what you're getting.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, as a student, I'm on a tight budget. I'm looking for something around 900 Euros per month. Is there any way we can meet in the middle?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm sorry, but 900 Euros is way below my acceptable range. The apartment is in high demand, and I can easily find a tenant who can afford my asking price. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because your offer is far below my asking price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position, and I appreciate the quality of the apartment. However, as a student, I simply cannot afford the prices you're asking. I'm sorry if my offer was too low, but I'm looking for something more within my budget. If you have any other apartments or if there's any other way we can work this out, I'd be open to discussing it.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I don't have any other apartments to offer. The one I presented to you is the best I can provide. I understand your budget constraints, but I need to get the best price possible for my property. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because your budget is far below my asking price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your time, Mr. Schmidt. I hope you find a tenant who can appreciate the value of the apartment. Goodbye.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Thank you for your interest, Mr. Abbasi. I wish you luck in finding an apartment that fits your needs and budget. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
